articles.description: The rise in energy prices appeared to be tied to concerns about production limits and potential disruptions to Russian supplies.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: China's bank regulator says the nation will not join Western sanctions imposed on Russia over Ukraine invasion - ABC News
articles.description: China's bank regulator says Beijing will not join the United States and European governments in imposing financial sanctions on Russia. He believes sanctions "will not have a good effect".
articles.content:
China's bank regulator says Beijing will not join the United States and European governments in imposing financial sanctions on Russia.

articles.title: Russian gas FACT-CHECKED: Would the EU and UK cope if Putin turned off the taps? - Express
articles.description: THE TRUE scale of European dependency on Russian gas is becoming increasingly clear as sanctions fail to bite on energy - but just how devastating would it be if Russia turned off the taps?

articles.description: China is the largest trading partner of both Russia and Ukraine, but sanctions from the US and its European allies have started to be felt by customers in both countries.
